casebody.data:
Consuelo Lara DE ESQUIVEL, Individually and as Next Friend of Louis Carlos Esquivel, a Minor, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. CITY OF SAN ANTONIO, Defendant-Appellee. No. 71-2078

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Sept. 10, 1971. Harold D. Putman, San Antonio, Tex., for plaintiff-appellant. Bernard Ladon, San Antonio, Tex., for defendant-appellee.

Before COLEMAN, SIMPSON, and MORGAN, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Company of New York et al., 5 Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1 a

a. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir., 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
